title: Online Instructional Design Workshop for Competency-Based Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational educational theory for prospective teachers
context.additional_context: A pre-service teacher training program aimed at establishing a competency-based assessment system aligned with the European Higher Education Area (EHEA) requirements

learning_goals: Learners can understand the operational principles of competency-based assessment tools (CAT) and utilize them in mobile environments.

Learners create a practical report detailing a three-stage self-directed learning design system (learning objectives-activities-feedback-improvement) within one week, achieving 4+ points on a 5-point scale (8+ points out of 10) based on peer and instructor rubric evaluations
Learners can develop and apply social competency assessment rubrics according to EHEA standards.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
